xxl.core.indexStructures

Class RTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree
      • xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree
        • xxl.core.indexStructures.RTree
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BufferedRtree, GreenesRTree, LinearRTree, LinearRTreeAT, QuadraticRTree, RevisedRTree, XTree

    public class RTree
extends ORTree
    An ORTree for objects with bounding rectangles as regions. This implementation of a member of the R-Tree family uses the split-strategy of the R*-Tree. For a detailed discussion see Norbert Beckmann, Hans-Peter Kriegel, Ralf Schneider, Bernhard Seeger: "The R*-tree: An Efficient and Robust Access Method for Points and Rectangles", ACM-SIGMOD (1990)322-331.
    See Also:
    Tree, ORTree, LinearRTree, QuadraticRTree, GreenesRTree
